attributes.action: urge the court of appeal to settle the 'unfair bank charges' case
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the banks have dragged thier feet for so long on this issue, does that mean the taxpayer gets to pick up that bill as well, & as the taxpayer has now put so much in - shouldnt the banks actually volunteer to pay thier customers what they know they owe?

rejection.details: Your title and petition should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement, about Government policy.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
